[ library(suspend) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

neg(?Expr, ?Bool)

Reified boolean operation
Expr
An arithmetic expression
Bool
Variable, 0 or 1

Description

Reified version of neg/1, i.e. the truth value of the boolean operation is reflected in the value of the 0/1 variable Bool.

This constraint suspends until its first argument is ground. It then unifies Bool according to the truth value of the corresponding neg/1 constraint.

Exceptions

(24) number expected
Expr is not an arithmetic expression.

See Also

neg / 1
